# 9: Players must be and act at least 16 years old.
Players must be at least 16 years old and demonstrate appropriate maturity.
Avoid overly childish, edgy, or inappropriate roleplay. Trolling, harassment, or disruptive behavior is prohibited. Follow all server rules without constant reminders or defiance.
This rule ensures a safe, enjoyable environment for all players. Immaturity disrupts gameplay and undermines the community.
